0000010001100010 0111110100101111 0 -> sum: 1000000110010001, cout: 0
1111101010011100 0111100110011000 0 -> sum: 0111010000110100, cout: 1

0000111010111011 0001010011101011 1 -> sum: 0010001110100111, cout: 0
0111100100110110 1111110011011011 1 -> sum: 0111011000010010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
